passenger.title: Passenger Vehicle Solutions
passenger.description: Providing high-performance, high-safety power battery solutions for passenger vehicles, supporting the development of new energy vehicles.

commercial.title: Commercial Vehicle Solutions
commercial.description: Offering reliable and durable power battery systems for commercial vehicles, meeting operational needs in various scenarios.

recycling.title: Recycling Solutions
